member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Produces an identity matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.#ctor(float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given scalar value.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.#ctor(mat3)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix by copying a given source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.#ctor(mat2)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given mat2 source matrix (2x2). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.#ctor(Unigine.mat4)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given mat4 source matrix (4x4). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.#ctor(Unigine.dmat4)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given dmat4 source matrix (3x4). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.#ctor(Unigine.vec3,Unigine.vec3,Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using given three vec3 vectors.
member.param: Source vector for the first column.
Source vector for the second column
Source vector for the third column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.#ctor(Unigine.quat)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given source quaternion.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.#ctor(float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given pointer to the array of float elements.
member.param: Pointer to the array of float elements.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.#ctor(float,ConstexprTag)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given constant float value.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.#ctor(float,float,float,float,float,float,float,float,float,ConstexprTag)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix with given constant float values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.set(int,int,float)
member.summary: Sets a new value of the matrix element specified by row and column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.set(Unigine.dmat4)
member.summary: Sets the matrix using a given dmat4 source matrix (3x4). The matrix elements are set equal to corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.set(Unigine.mat4)
member.summary: Sets the matrix using a given mat4 source matrix (4x4). The matrix elements are set equal to corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.set(float)
member.summary: Sets new matrix values using a pointer to the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.set(Unigine.quat)
member.summary: Sets the matrix using a given source quaternion.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.set(mat3)
member.summary: Sets the matrix equal to the specified source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.set(mat2)
member.summary: Sets new matrix values using a given mat2 source matrix (2x2). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.get
member.summary: Returns the pointer to the matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.get const
member.summary: Returns the constant pointer to the matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.get(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the reference to the matrix element specified by a given row and column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.get(int,int) const
member.summary: Returns the value of the matrix element specified by given row and column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.get(float) const
member.summary: Fills the destination matrix, specified by the given pointer, with matrix values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.setColumn(int,Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Sets the specified column of the matrix using a given vec3 vector as a source.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.getColumn(int) const
member.summary: Returns the specified matrix column.
member.returns: The vec3 vector with column values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.setDiagonal(Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Sets the main diagonal of the matrix using a given vec3 vector as a source.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.getDiagonal const
member.summary: Returns the main diagonal of the matrix.
member.returns: The vec3 vector with the elements of the main diagonal.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.setIdentity
member.summary: Sets the matrix equal to the identity matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.getQuat const
member.summary: Returns the quaternion of the matrix values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.setRotate(Unigine.vec3,float)
member.summary: Sets the rotation matrix for a given axis.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.setRotateX(float)
member.summary: Sets X rotation matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.setRotateY(float)
member.summary: Sets Y rotation matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.setRotateZ(float)
member.summary: Sets Z rotation matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.setRow(int,Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Sets the specified row of the matrix using a given vec3 vector as a source.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.getRow(int) const
member.summary: Returns the specified matrix row.
member.returns: The vec3 vector with column values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.setScale(Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Fills the scaling matrix using a given vec3 source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.setSkewSymmetric(Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Fills the skew-symmetric matrix using a given vec3 source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.setZero
member.summary: Sets all matrix elements equal to 0.

member.summary: Performs matrix addition.

member.summary: Performs matrix negation.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.operator-=(mat3)
member.summary: Performs matrix subtraction.

member.summary: Performs matrix assignment. Destination matrix = Source matrix.

member.summary: Performs array access to the matrix item using given item index.

member.summary: Performs array access to the matrix item reference using given item index.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.getAxisX const
member.summary: Returns the normalized vector representing the X axis. Call this method to get the right or left vector of the matrix:

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.getAxisY const
member.summary: Returns the normalized vector representing the Y axis. Call this method to get the back or forward vector of the matrix:

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat3.getAxisZ const
member.summary: Returns the normalized vector representing the Z axis. Call this method to get the up or down vector of the matrix:

member.summary: Returns the trace of the matrix.
